# indicatorColorTransformer

**Instance Property**

The color transformer for resolving the indicator color.

## Declaration

```swift
var indicatorColorTransformer: UIConfigurationColorTransformer? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this color transformer to set a custom color for [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIButtonConfiguration/indicator]. For example, the following code uses a grayscale color for the indicator instead of the default color.

```swift
var config = UIButton.Configuration.filled()
config.indicatorColorTransformer = UIConfigurationColorTransformer.grayscale
```

## Configuring the indicator

- **indicator**: The style of the indicator that appears on the button.
- **UIButton.Configuration.Indicator**: Constants that determine the style of the indicator that appears on a button.
